content: simply gorgeous daisy granny square afghan crochet pattern in 3 sizes sweet puffy daisy granny squares are so fun to make easy to follow pattern with detailed instructions this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level advanced beginner > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern size baby afghan 30 x 35 lapghan 40 x 50 and afghan 50 x 60 materials needed - worsted weight yarn - crochet hook size h 8/5 00 mm - tapestry needle pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/daisy-granny-square-blanket/
